full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BZANG SPYOD SMON LAM GYI 'CHI BSLU BA'I CHO GA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003B (ZHES SOGS KYIS SMON LAM DANG BKRA SHIS KYI BRGYAN PAR BYA, ,BZANG PO SPYOD PA'I 'CHI BSLU 'DI BYED LUGS KYANG MI 'DRA BA SNA TSOGS 'DUG KYANG, ,BLA MA MCHOD PA DANG 'BREL BA'I 'DI NI RJE BTZUN DAM PA DZNYA NA BADZRA GYI SLOB MA THA SHAL BA BKA' BCU BLO BZANG DAR RGYAS KYIS BGYIS PA 'DI LA NONGS PA'I TSOGS MCHIS NA MKHAS PA RNAMS KYIS BZOD PAR MDZOD, ,DGE LEGS GYUR CIG , ,,MANGGA LAm, ,)
